fields_of_interest: Trade, Competition, Consumers, International co-operation and development, Customs, Energy, Environment, Transport, Climate Action
head_office_address: General Motors Washington, DC Office 25 Massachusetts Ave., NW Suite 400
eu_initiatives: GM follows a range of EU/EC policies including: CO2 Post 2020, WLTP and RDE/air quality, autonomous vehicles, alternative powertrains, artificial intelligence & cybersecurity.
section: II - In-house lobbyists and trade/business/professional associations
relevant_communication: We engage in policy discussions via face-to-face meetings, attending pertinent briefings.
goals__remit: General Motors is the largest automotive manufacturer in the United States. Although GM does not have a direct presence currently in the EU, it does have an interest in EU policies. Our brands include Chevrolet, Cadillac, Buick, GMC. As a global concern, we have a presence in 134 countries in the world, and manufacture in 54 of those.
